title: Abstraction
alt: If I'm such a god, why isn't Maru *my* cat?
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a computer.]
An x64 processor is screaming along at billions of cycles per second to run the XNU kernel, which is frantically working through all the POSIX-specified abstraction to create the Darwin system underlying OS X, which in  turn is straining itself to run Firefox and its Gecko renderer, which creates a Flash object which renders dozens of video frames every secondbecause I wanted to see a cat jump into a box and fall over.I am a god.
